website_summaries.verdict: If the princess lover in your life wants to play dress-up, this is a great place to start their dress up collection.
pros: Includes 4 pairs of shoes, 3 bracelets, 3 rings, 2 pairs of earrings, and a crown
Shoes fit several different ages and the heels aren't too high
cons: The jewelry is fragile, so it isn't ideal for 2-3 year olds

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are decently constructed for dress up toys. She's lost a couple but not have broken. They're plastic so not really comfortable for long wear if that's your intent. The box is nice for presentation but it's just cardboard so don't expect to last long with rowdy kids. The jewelry is your basic dollar store stuff so expect as much. The real winner here is the variety of princess shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: They are plastic so I didn’t expect them to last a long time, but my daughter loves them. She wears them all day long and they have held up quite nicely. She is 4 and they are a little big so she will be able to use them for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5-year old granddaughter because she had outgrown the ones I bought for her a couple of years ago! These are flatter than the others and easier for her to walk in. She loves the shoes and the jewelry. They were shipped quickly and are in very nice gift box. She loves the jewelry that comes in the set. Really glad I bought these. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Popnzs

customer_reviews.title: Little Princess Jackpot!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old daughter for Christmas & couldn't be happier! It comes with 4 sets of "high heels" and assorted jewelry. This is perfect for any little princesses out there! I was happy that the heels were not high at all, as I was concerned with my daughter walking if they were too high. It comes in a cute little display box that we have actually kept, so we could put the shoes back in it while they are not being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Barry

customer_reviews.title: As soon as she saw it she loved it and right away wanted to wear all of ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave it to our 3 year old granddaughter for her birthday. As soon as she saw it she loved it and right away wanted to wear all of the shoes. The shoes were big for her but she is only 3. It didn't matter to her. I left it with her so I don't have any info about how it holds up. Seems like great fun for a little girl that wants to be a princess.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Rush

customer_reviews.title: works for small and bigger girls
customer_reviews.text: The dress up shoes and jewelry were at big hit at my grand-daughters 4th birthday party. We had to hide them because her older sister and her were both walking around in them and the noise on our tile was too much. The shoes fit my 4 year old, 6 year old grand-daughters and their 9 year old big sister. They had great fun with the jewelry also
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: which we love. However the 4 bangle bracelets
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very cute and they fit in the storage box, which we love. However the 4 bangle bracelets, earrings, and rings do not have an enclosed storage space. I thought the top two spaces were drawers for the jewelry, but they are just shelves. That's my only disappointment with this nice dress up toy! Our little girls are having fun with the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: amy ryan faga

customer_reviews.title: Dress up Shoe and Jewelry Boutique
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves the shoes. She wears them all over the house and plays with them all the time. They are made well. The jewelry is rather fragile and we are waiting for her to be older to give them to her as we know she will break them right away now. In another 6 months or so we will give them to her. The carry case they come in is nice too and a good place to store them. This is a good deal for the little girl that wants to dress up in pretty shoes. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Girls liked it.
customer_reviews.text: My girls really like this but my only complaint is that the shoes are kind of tight and not shaped right (I would consider their feet normal.) They wear them regardless and love the little jewelry that came with it too. The earings broke pretty quick but that’s plastic and kids for ya. Overall I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Henderson

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: Received with 1 broken shoe which was not noticed until my niece opened her gift. I was not about to take back the gift from a 3 year old to return to Amazon so I paid for junk. Very poor quality. Ear rings hurt the earlobes because of hard sharp points where they snap on. Looks great in the box but don’t waste your money uless you only want it to place on display.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Looks like hours of dressup fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Boutique to have in my house when my granddaughters come to visit. I have not used it yet but it truly looks like hours of dress up fun. I only had one set of dress up shoes for the girls to share and they would end up fighting over them. Now I have enough for both of them to even change their shoes. I'm sure they are going to love them!
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter received this for her birthday. She absolutely loves them. They were what I had expected for dress up shoes for a kid. They are actually made better than most i’ve seen, I have 3 girls, so i’ve seen a bunch of these shoes. The first day, however, the flower popped off the top of the shoe. I emailed their customer service and sent them a picture. They were extremely prompt and accommodating. She had a whole new set in 3 days! It’s been a month and we’ve since had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wesorick

customer_reviews.title: Size/fit of shoes inaccurate for > 3 years old
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice item. I had to return item because age range was misrepresented as it relates to size. I was concerned about shoe size fitting >3 year of age. Advertising by company says 3-10. Reviews indicated 3-6-9 year olds could wear same shoes. That is not the case at all. A 3 year olds shoe size differs greatly from a 6 year old and more so from a 9 year old It should be advertised as sized for up to 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Javelina

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Shoe Trunk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this trunk of shoes! I bought this for my daughter's 2nd birthday because she is fascinated with jewelry and shoes. As soon as she opened it, she screamed princess shoes and immediately put every pair. This is such a great value and they should last for quite some time as my daughter has plenty of room to grow into them. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Candice S.

customer_reviews.title: Disposable one day of play toy
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart almost instantly. Decorations on shoes all came off, the plastic slip where the feet goes breaks off. The metallic on the jewelry chips off.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flareau

customer_reviews.title: Great Princess set
customer_reviews.text: Shoes broke on the middle and the emblems come off pretty easily. But overall, this is a really fun set. I have no idea how my daughter was able to break the shoes. She's only three. She really enjoys the variety of tops, bottoms, shoes, and Jewelry accessories. Of course, she can't do anything without wearing the tiara. This is a must-buy for any toddler. Whether they like Disney princesses, or just want to play dress up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony, Lizzy & Annika

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Got for my little girl for her birthday bc she loves shoes and crowns. The one pair of shoes broke within a few hours. And a second pair. The heel completely broke off. She’s 3. Not very rough of them. The crown also kept popping off the headband part and the last time the whole thing broke off and can’t be fixed. Waste of money. Very disappointed in this
customer_reviews.author: Victoria NJ

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t spend more than $10 / maybe good for one day’s use
customer_reviews.text: While these aren’t expected to be great quality given the price, this is worse than dollar store.. these aren’t even fully painted and feel like going to break just opening the “hinge” to put these on. I doubt these last 24 hours before breaking apart completely. Spend money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: jmc13

customer_reviews.title: Princess dress up accessories
customer_reviews.text: My girls enjoy putting on the jewelry and shoes to add to their dress up clothes. Shoes are made well to wear for indoors. Customer service are amazing. We had an earring that didn't close well so we asked if we can get another pair. They provided excellent service by going above and beyond by sending us another set. We blessed another friend with the extra set.
customer_reviews.author: Quyen Fitting

customer_reviews.title: Does he look like a bitch?
customer_reviews.text: I use this to punish my son for bad behavior. He's 15 and is a wise ass so I make him wear the shoes and tiara while I scream Pulp Fiction quotes at him.
customer_reviews.author: E Rock

customer_reviews.title: they do not go up to age 10
customer_reviews.text: bought them and had to return, they are very cute and I love the box they come in. However, the play heels are very small, they didn't even fit my niece and she is 8 years old. Sadly I had to return. I would say, they were probably a size 10. but great for small girls who want to dress grown up. so fun.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute and my four year old was very excited to receive this for Christmas. However, the plastic is so cheap, two of the shoes and the tiara broke within a week. The decorative pieces on the shoes themselves come off constantly, and the plastic on the top of the shoes is sharp - it cut my daughter’s foot. Definitely not a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JD610

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT KIDS LOVE IT BUT BROKEN WITHIN 2 HOURS
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my 4 year old from her aunty . My kid loved it but needless to say within 2 hours all the buckles had broken off the shoes and the jewellery was falling apart .. for the price of this that’s totally unacceptable !! Great idea but quality lets the product down
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two year old niece and they were a big hit. The packaging is super cute and she loved everything inside. The shoes were a great size and even have tiny grip pieces on the bottom to keep her from falling. Definitely would recommend this - great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: bphillips07

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing but my granddaughter didn’t care.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it, however I think after it came I think it was over priced. There was also jewels missing from earrings- she didn’t care and I have beads/ fake gems to glue on so it’s not a big deal- there are less expensive sets I found after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what I expected but I’m disappointed. One pair of shoes already broke. My granddaughter likes it though and that’s all that really matters. But then again she thinks it cost a dollar lol. I would but these for her again but would never pay $27. $10-15 tops.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Good, but lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Good little dress up shoes for my daughter. However, the medallions on the toes are only push together and all fell off the slippers in the first week. I'm having to find the medallions and super glue them on. Good presentation, but durability is none existant when it comes to a 3 year old playing dress up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for little girls
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my 2 little granddaughters for Christmas. They LOVED them! I think they were their favorite presents under the tree, and they are still getting a lot of play a month later. I am very pleased, and so are they.
customer_reviews.author: Claire K

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broke easily.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved them and loves to wear them around the house for play. Unfortunately a heel cracked on one shoe the very first day and she has been nervous walking in them since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old like it and fits
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my great neice. Her mom told me the quality was not too bad. My neice was happy so that’s what matters the most. This was also well priced for how much you get compared to the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Chieko

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 4 yr old for Christmas. First pair she had one snapped in half. She had them on for a few hours. Threw those away and she put on the second pair, she tripped and fell (normal 4yr old clumsiness) and a chunk broke off. They seem to be shaped a little odd for the feet and they are very narrow. My daughter still loves the other 2 pairs, but I’m very disappointed the others didn’t even make it 24hrs.
customer_reviews.author: WhitMart

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute for the price however they are not that durable. The plastic bows and flowers pop off easily. It is great for immediate entertainment but for the long term for a little one, they may become upset when it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: C_trureview

customer_reviews.title: Good for littles
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves her gift! These are super fun for play mode. She did tear off the bows on the shoes fairly easily but they still work great for dress up! She loves the rings and tiara also. They have held up to her dress up play daily!
customer_reviews.author: STeegarden

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. I’m not expecting the most amazing quality but literally minutes after my daughter wore the shoes, the decor on the front popped off. It’s easily fixed with my glue gun.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes! They are super cute but low quality. One pair broke the day she got them. But for the price, I didn’t expect much. The jewelry is good for when she wants to play dressup. The clip on earrings hurt her ears so she doesn’t wear those.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Singh

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased- keeping my Girls engaged in play
customer_reviews.text: My 2 & 3 year old love this present! They walk all around the house in the little heels even going up and down stairs (even though I tell them not to) & even dance in them! The one other set of play shoes purchased somewhere different they cannot do hardly anything besides fall.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set, reason I’m giving it 3 stars is because the flower thing on the shoe came off 2 days into my daughter using it. I don’t know what she did but she is only 2 so she shouldn’t of been able to take it off so easily
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Giordano

customer_reviews.title: It arrived really quick
customer_reviews.text: As this is a Christmas Present, It hasn't been used, but I can tell you the shipping was extremely quick. It looks like a nice set that she will have hours of fun with. If you have a little girl that likes to dress up, this is just what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Brought the princess dress up & play shoes for my 3 year old grand baby for Christmas. She love to walk in shoes that have heels. This is the perfect gift for her cause she no longer walks in my high heels. I would definitely recommend this item for little girls that like to play dress up.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, my three year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's favorite birthday present! She just turned three and loves princess stuff and jewelry, so what a perfect combination. Sturdy, shoes are definitely too big for a three year old, but my daughter still runs around in them and loves them just the same!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bombard

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter loved it . The shoes were a perfect fit . She has been wearing the ring and bracelets and shoes since she's opened it on Saturdays for her birthday . . She turned 6 . Great buy .
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed with this product. When it arrived we were so excited to give it to my daughter as a gift. When she opened it and tried on one pair of earrings it would not snap close on her ears so she can't wear them and the litte bows and flowers on the shoes keep falling off after wearing them a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: gns527

customer_reviews.title: A hit of a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for 3 year old twins. When they opened the gift, all the little girls came running up and couldn't wait for the box to be opened. Within minutes, they all were wearing every item. I have not heard if the quality is holding up but it sure was a hit with the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: MaryK

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely too small for our 4.5 year old. The length wasn’t the issue, it was the strap that goes across the top. There isn’t a specific left and right shoe either. The jewelry was nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor Bolotin

customer_reviews.title: No way for girls up to age 12
customer_reviews.text: Almost a total waste of money. Pretty sure the shoes will fit my 5 year old. Her sister is 8 so I thought they could share the shoes.Forget it. These shoes would fits kids to maximum age of 5 unless she is extremely petite. If I had paid $50 i would definitely have returned them. Don't waste your money. Oh and one of the pairs of shoes are mismatched in sizes. I
customer_reviews.author: Saskia

customer_reviews.title: Fun but Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Both of my grandchildren thought the shoes were hilarious. The jumped around, danced, and broke all four pair within hours. This set would make a good party favor for a small birthday for little girls age five. But they are super cheap and will not last.
customer_reviews.author: M Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: Although she loves the gift. Her feet won't fit in the shoes. She is a big 4 year old. She wears a size 6 and her feet were just to fat for the shoe. lol But she wears them anyway!!
customer_reviews.author: LolaW

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the shoes are very good, they are sturdy and the plastic does not ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. The quality of the shoes are very good, they are sturdy and the plastic does not stretch or become misshapen. The other thing I appreciated was the packaging. The shoes and jewelry were very easy to get out of the packaging. Which was very important since my daughter was so excited to start playing with them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old daughter loved these. The shoes were a bit big for her age, but still worked. The price for this on Amazon is much better than comparable items in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for girls and their friends - I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very Quick delivery, right on time for our birthday girl. She loved it!! Clear, the product is made of plastics, but so far, it looks good. Quality looks alright and definitely like not super cheap "crap". The shoes are even screwed, which was a surprise to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Earnings could be made better
customer_reviews.text: This set looked very cute and was received with excitement by my daughter. I was sadly disappointed by the lack of durability. Within minutes of play one of the earrings broke. After a while all of the earrings have broken. My daughter is 4 and plays very gently with her toys.
customer_reviews.author: M1GATRON

customer_reviews.title: Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year old granddaughter and she loves it! It more so she would stay out my shoes but they were a hit! I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Inda G.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a girly girl please dress up shoes will put a smile on her face.
customer_reviews.text: Our little granddaughter love these shoes! Love them! We would recommend these to anybody if you want to make your little girl happy. She's only two years old and there a lot longer than her feet but she had them on and was walking around immediately after opening the box. The shoes are very colorful and she just absolutely love them and plays with them all the time. We were very very happy to find them.
customer_reviews.author: FireFighter1201

customer_reviews.title: Well liked, but poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for because as soon as my granddaughter started wearing the shoes, the embellishments started popping off. That was very disappointing. However, in general, this item was still a HUGE hit with her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 year old. While she has tiny feet (size 7 shoes), they are super big but she makes them work. She will have plenty of room to grow! I love that the company who makes them is a family owned company and that’s the reason for even writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmicdad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The bows broke off after several uses. The tiaras also broke, everything is cheaply made. Not worth the price for how much all the pieces break.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes either fell apart or broke within one week of begining to use them. We purchased them in advance for Christmas so by the time they started falling apart it was too late to return them. I would not purchase this item again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for three year old
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to get. Saw this and decided to give it a try. Went to their home. I was sent a video. The sisters loved it. Went with their princess dresses. A hit.
customer_reviews.author: Trecia

customer_reviews.title: Cute but prop 65 warning on label
customer_reviews.text: Adorable product, so cute! Unfortunately, there was a Prop 65 sticker attached to the box, which means in the state of CA we are notified if something we purchase is made up of chemicals. This is the warning “WARNING: This product contains chemicals known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.” Why do we use materials like this in toys? That children play with. It’s sad! My niece loved the toy but we’ll have to toss it soon so it’s not a health hazard.
customer_reviews.author: MariC

customer_reviews.title: Happy little girl!
customer_reviews.text: Princess dress-up accessories and “heels” is a big hit with our four year old daughter. A lot of fun for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product not what expected. Poorly made and shoes are very slick on the bottom. Very unsafe for 3 year old to walk on any other floor besides carpet.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 4 year old princess
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the little 4 year old princess. She was sooooo happy and couldn't believe I got this for her birthday. Comes in the cutest box too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shively

customer_reviews.title: A hit for young girls
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 5 year old granddaughter for her birthday. She was thrilled. Her 2 year old sister had to immediately try on the shoes. Plenty to share!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Princess set, shoes run small.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect Princess kit. The shoes run small. My 3 year old Granddaughter wears a 10, so they barely fit her.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set - Not for 2 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old granddaughter. The shoes are to big and so is the jewelry - better for an older little girl. But the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINA KEEGAN

customer_reviews.title: Everything BROKE within mins
customer_reviews.text: Everything started breaking the moment we opened it...one earring broke from each pair, the shoes broke, it is so cheap and fragile. My daughters (4 & 5) were really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Cute dress-ups
customer_reviews.text: As adorable as they appear in picture. 3 yr. old granddaughter has hardly taken them off since she received them on Christmas. Really cute and would buy again! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: HJNTEX

customer_reviews.title: Not best quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoe decorations pop off easily. In the first 3 days, they were all missing and then one had cracked when my 4yo jumped in them. Seems to be not quality I'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: Three year olds love these
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect for my granddaughters. Only wish there were two crowns included instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie LynneTomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item to a little 3 year old she loved them, but they were a little big for her!! Still worked and will grow into them. The box is so cute!! A must for a girlie girl!!!
customer_reviews.author: tracerap

customer_reviews.title: she liked it but the shoes were almost impossible for her ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3 yr old granddaughter, she liked it but the shoes were almost impossible for her to wear. Wish they were softer and smaller?
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: A for presentation, D for quality.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it...she was so happy. But then a part of one of the tiara came apart within hours! So not sure on quality.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece and she loves them! They fit her perfectly, she loves being a princess.
customer_reviews.author: Imabanana

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old granddaughters birthday. She loved it. She kept changing her shoes all day.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita nunn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very cheap as in built. My kids ran in them the first day and I was down to 2 pair. 6 months later they are all in the garbage. Kids had fun with them while it lasted. Most likely wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift for my girly 2-year-old
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old has been OBSESSED with shoes since I can remember. No matter whose shoes she sees, she loves playing with them and trying them on. This was the PERFECT gift for her. Her and my 5-year-old daughter love playing with the shoes and jewelry. Great value for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but one shoe is missing
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but came with one shoe missing? I will not return it because I’m worried the replacement will not arrive before Christmas. I will just have to figure out something
customer_reviews.author: Maria Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughters love me
customer_reviews.text: I got my two grandchildren a box of these and they couldn't be happier. The product is perfect for young girls.
customer_reviews.author: Ted J Kozlowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly made for a little princess
customer_reviews.text: My little three year old is loving this set! It is really well packaged in a sturdy box to store the items when not in use. Also, the jewelry and shoes seem perfectly made for a little one. My daughter took the shoe pendant apart - it was easy to click back on. The crown is comfy and seem sturdy. Overall, a great purchase with a great price!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The variety was excellent. Good number of items to chose from especially the variety of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Alice Forthman

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Present!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was absolutely thrilled with her beautiful dress up set, in fact, she stopped opening her other presents and just played with her “fancy shoes”! It was a delight to see her so happy and engaged with creative play! Truly a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My Granddaughter will love these. She is turning 5 and they look like they will fit her perfectly! She is a size 9
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. This was a gift for my grand daughter's 3rd birthday. It was by no means the most expensive or extravagant. But it was far and away the favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected.  Prompt and as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift to a two year old. She loved it and will have it for a few years of dress up. Fantastic gift.
customer_reviews.author: DJ's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Little girl’s favorite Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this gift! She loves to play dress up and particularly likes high heels!
customer_reviews.author: potter

customer_reviews.title: My kids are so excited for these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids ages 2 4 and 6. They are so excited to use it!!! I love how it comes in this box which you can be used to store them (see the picture)
customer_reviews.author: leah gold

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great - hours of entertainment especially when there is bad weather outside.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for my granddaughter!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter ABSOLUTELY loved this! She is very picky and sometimes opens a package, looks at it and puts it down. This time she carried it around and around took things out wore the jewelry tried on and walked with the shoes on and on and on. We were both truly delighted. Thanks SO very much!
customer_reviews.author: joan pruett

customer_reviews.title: Playtime is much more fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this gift. She has played with the jewelry everyday. The shoes where a little small but she still wears them. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but my kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My girls absolutely loved this as they love dress up, however, the jewelry fell apart in one day. Super cheaply made but the kids don’t know that, they just love to click around in their heels. The bows/decoration on each shoe comes off and the little attachment to it once lost is hard to find. Overall they are a hit and don’t squeeze or hurt their little feet like others I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for my little niece Alexis. She is now a beautiful Princess, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kem

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a Princess!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Bought it for her 5th Bday and she couldnt wait to wear everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap shoe strap immediately broke after just a few minutes earrings never stayed on overpriced nice presentation though
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Crystal Olsen

customer_reviews.title: A hit with granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this and it was hit from the opening of the package (3 1/2 year old)
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are very fragile
customer_reviews.text: good costumer service. one of the shoes was broken, got a new set few days after.
customer_reviews.author: shairad

customer_reviews.title: They were ok
customer_reviews.text: Like other people mentioned, bows on the front of shoes came off after a few times of playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Earrings incident
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the princess dress up set for my granddaughter 4th birthday and she loves it however the very tip of the clamp on the earring where you snap onto the ear lope was very sharp. It poke her ear and hurt. We had to file it down to where it was rounded. She was afraid to to put them on her ear but has come around. I hope this helps to prevent future incidents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter loves it. Shoes have lasted through a month of play so far. Earrings are a little cheap and have broken, but my daughter loves the product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter fell in love with her shoes! Our little diva walking around the house with her fancy shoes! Great value for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it. It fit amazing and she dresses like a princess whenever she wants. So worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Loric

product_meta.title: Toyvelt Princess Dress Up & Play Shoe and Jewelry Boutique (Includes 4 Pairs of Shoes + Multiple Fashion Accessories) Best Toys For 3, 4, Year Old Girls And Up
product_meta.description:
WARNING:
CHOKING HAZARD -- Small parts. Not for children under 3 yrs.
feature_bullets: MEGA PRINCESS BUNDLE - Includes: 4 pairs of dress up shoes for girls in different styles and colors Bundle has 3 bangles, 3 rings, 2 pairs of earrings 1 crown and strong storage box to store them all neatly.

THE REAL FEEL OF A PRINCESS - The princess shoes dress up and jewelry set promotes imaginary play, social-emotional skills, and creative play. It is the best dress up toy for ages 3 - 12 years old girls.

DURABLE STRONG STORAGE BOX INCLUDED - Makes it neat and very easy to carry around. It holds very neat all pairs of dress-up shoes instead of having your little princess losing them when leaving it scattered after play. She will feel like a little lady with her own princess shoe closet.
BUILDING UP KIDS CONFIDENCE - Dressing them up with fairy princess shoes and dangling pretend jewelry makes them feel like a princess and boost their self confidence among friends and family.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! - We know our quality and know that you will satisfied with this, if not there is always the amazon 30 days return window
